welcome_message_body: Welcome to Doncaster, a charming city known for its rich history, traditional markets, and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Zest
restaurants.description: Zest is a bbq joint located in Doncaster.

restaurants.name: Frenchgate Cafe
restaurants.description: Frenchgate Cafe is a café located in Doncaster.

restaurants.name: Cactus Jack
restaurants.description: Cactus Jack is a mexican restaurant located in Doncaster.

restaurants.name: Rothwells Fisheries
restaurants.description: Rothwells Fisheries is a fish and chips shop located in Doncaster.

restaurants.name: Turkuaz Bar & Grill
restaurants.description: Turkuaz Bar & Grill is a mediterranean restaurant located in Doncaster.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a range of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting the network name and entering a password provided by the airport staff.
